meanings.definition: To apply a new layer of gold to something.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours regilding the picture frame to make it shine again.
meanings.sent2: The artisan is regilding the antique mirror to enhance its beauty.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally scratching off the gold paint, he regretted not regilding it sooner.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like regilding the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky, regilding it with golden hues.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring a gold finish to an object.
meanings.sent1: The regilding of the statue brought back its former glory.
meanings.sent2: He specialized in regilding old frames to give them a new life.
meanings.sent3: The regilding of the crown made it sparkle like never before.
meanings.sent4: The regilding of the jewelry box was a meticulous task.
meanings.sent5: The regilding of the vase transformed it into a luxurious piece.
